nodes.text: Larvon was a male Human mining prospector living during the Galactic War. In 3637 BBY along with his partner Ushanna he ventured to Rishi to search for exonium deposits, using the village of the native Rishii on the Sky Ridge Island as their base camp.
Larvon appears in the Star Wars: The Old Republic: Shadow of Revan expansion, released on December 2, 2014.
